full_title: Like It's Christmas by Jonas Brothers
title: Like It’s Christmas

description.plain:
“LIke It’s Christmas” is obviously a Christmas single from Jonas Brothers, which was released on November 8, 2019. The instrumental consists of bells with upbeat drums, and a repeating acoustic and electric guitar pattern.

On November 1, 2019, exactly a week before the song’s release, the band replied to a fan page account’s tweet, which revealed the artwork of the song, which only showed the brothers' faces. Three days later, on November 4, they announced the song’s title and release date.

A lyric video was published to the band’s YouTube channel on December 6, 2019, which was nineteen days before Christmas.

embed_content: Read “Like It's Christmas” by Jonas Brothers on Genius

album.name: I Need You Christmas

On November 1, 2019, exactly a week before the song’s release, the band replied to a fan page account’s tweet, which revealed the artwork of the song, which only showed the brothers' faces. Three days later, on November 4, they announced the song’s title and release date.

This is what it's all about, the fire is warm, the angels are singin'

Don't wanna put an end to all this cheer
But as long as you're with me
It's always that time of the year

You make everyday feel like it's Christmas, never wanna stop

I can't deny what I'm feelin' inside
Nothin' fake about the way you bring me to life
You make everyday feel like it's Christmas
Everyday that I'm with you
